alert.note: Alert for Henry; Rock Island (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 25 at 10:02AM CDT until March 29 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Rock River near Joslin affecting Henry IL, Rock Island and Whiteside Counties. Rock River at Moline affecting Henry IL and Rock Island Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this evening. && ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT TO LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Rock River at Moline. * WHEN...From late Monday night to late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Minor Flood Stage. Water affects residences near the 27th Street bridge. Water is over portions of 60th St south of Green Valley Sports Complex and portions of 56th Ave along the north side of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 10.8 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - &&
